channel.title: Trying To Change Home[PI]
channel.description: Hello guys i am trying to change my home teleport and i am getting something like this [code]//home teleports case 4171: case 50056: String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient"; c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.EDGEVILLE_X, Config.EDGEVILLE_Y, 0, type); break;[/code] i looked in the config file i found it but i would be changing the glory teleport and i dont wanna do that so if you can help me just reply Thanks,Nick :cool:

item.title: Trying To Change Home[PI]
item.dc:creator: @EzioAuditori EzioAuditori
item.description:
@EzioAuditori wrote:

Just do this…

//home teleports case 4171: c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.EDGEVILLE_X, Config.EDGEVILLE_Y, 0, type); break; case 50056: String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient"; c.getPA().startTeleport(INSERT X COORD, INSERT Y COORD, 0, type); break;

Just put the x coord of where you want your glory to teleport you to in the “INSERT X COORD”, and do the same with the y coord at “INSERT Y COORD”.

EDIT:Basically all I did was seperate the two processes with “break;” and added a different teleport option for home teleport.

Read full topic

item.title: Trying To Change Home[PI]

item.description:

Hello guys i am trying to change my home teleport and i am getting something like this

//home teleports case 4171: case 50056: String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient"; c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.EDGEVILLE_X, Config.EDGEVILLE_Y, 0, type); break;
i looked in the config file i found it but i would be changing the glory teleport and i dont wanna do that so if you can help me just reply
